mapper.select: SELECT PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT A.SEQ, A.TITLE, A.USER_ID, A.USER_IP, B.USER_NAME, A.VIEW_CNT, A.REPLY_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 ROWNUM FROM BOARD_QNA A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) NUM WHERE A.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%') ORDER BY A.SEQ ) DATA ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) PAGE LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM BOARD_QNA A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%')

SELECT A.SEQ, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.USER_ID, A.USER_IP, B.USER_NAME, A.VIEW_CNT, A.REPLY_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD_QNA A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE BOARD_QNA SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT A.SEQ, A.P_SEQ, A.CONTENTS, A.USER_ID, A.USER_IP, B.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD_QNA_ANSWER A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT A.SEQ, A.P_SEQ, A.CONTENTS, A.USER_ID, A.USER_IP, B.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD_QNA_ANSWER A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.SEQ = #{aSeq} ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC
UPDATE BOARD_QNA_ANSWER SET CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{aSeq}

SELECT A.SEQ, A.TITLE, A.USER_ID, B.USER_NAME, A.VIEW_CNT, A.REPLY_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD_QNA A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} ORDER BY A.SEQ LIMIT ${limit}
